meeting_request.purpose: Feeling disconnected from my major and uncertain about my future
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Cheryl, a first-year Political Science major. I’ve taken a few classes and already feel like I’m in a different world than what I’m used to doing. Some of my classes are really heavy on political theory and history, and I’m not really interested in that. Other than that, I’m not really sure what I’m supposed to be doing here. I’m trying to major in something I’m really passionate about (environmental policy), but I’m not sure if I even fit in here or if I should be switching things up. I’m also feeling really isolated from other students in my major, and I don’t know if I’m alone in feeling this way.
